8.11 DUIM-Gadgets Module

<radio-menu-button>

Open abstract instantiable class

Summary

The class of radio buttons that can appear in menus.

Superclasses

<menu-button>

Init-keywords

None.

Library

duim-gadgets

Module

duim-gadgets

Description

The class of radio buttons that can appear in menus. Isolated radio menu buttons are of limited use: you will normally want to combine several instances of such buttons using the <radio-menu-box> gadget.

Figure 8.31 A radio menu button

Internally, this class maps into the menu radio item Windows control.

Operations

None.

Example

contain(make(<radio-menu-button>, label: "Hello"));

See also

<menu-button>, page 616

<push-menu-button>, page 629

<radio-menu-box>, page 632

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
